meanings.definition: The state or quality of being premature.
meanings.sent1: The prematurenesses of the baby's birth worried the parents.
meanings.sent2: The prematurenesses of the flowers blooming in winter was surprising.
meanings.sent3: The prematurenesses of the cake baking made it collapse in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The prematurenesses of the storm's arrival caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The prematurenesses of the student's answer revealed his lack of preparation.

meanings.definition: The condition of occurring or developing before the usual or proper time.
meanings.sent1: The prematurenesses of the event caused confusion among the attendees.
meanings.sent2: The prematurenesses of the seeds sprouting in just a day amazed the gardener.
meanings.sent3: The prematurenesses of the alarm clock ringing woke him up too early.
meanings.sent4: The prematurenesses of the sunrise painted the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent5: The prematurenesses of the train's arrival made him miss his ride.
